statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patient_records WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_visit FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM PatientDiagnosis WHERE diagnosis_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE date_of_visit BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT record_id, patient_name, medical_condition FROM PatientRecords WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_visit FROM PatientRecords WHERE date_of_visit BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT diagnosis, treatment_plan, prescription FROM PatientDiagnosis WHERE record_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_visit, medical_condition FROM PatientRecords WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM PatientDiagnosis JOIN PatientRecords ON PatientDiagnosis.record_id = PatientRecords.record_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctor_records ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM doctor_records JOIN appointment_logs ON doctor_records.doctor_id = appointment_logs.doctor_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctor_records ORDER BY doctor_name DESC
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointment_logs WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT doctor_name, contact_number FROM doctor_records WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology'
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients WHERE gender='F';
SELECT doctor_id, full_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis='Fever';
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM doctors ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_visit, prescription FROM medical_records ORDER BY date_of_visit ASC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT doctors.full_name, specialties.specialty FROM doctors JOIN specialties ON doctors.specialty_id = specialties.specialty_id WHERE specialties.specialty = 'Cardiology'

SELECT p.full_name, m.date_of_visit, m.diagnosis, d.full_name as doctor_name FROM patients p JOIN medical_records m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id ORDER BY m.date_of_visit ASC
SELECT full_name, address, phone_number FROM patients WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%'

SELECT m.date_of_visit, p.full_name as patient_name, d.full_name as doctor_name, a.reason FROM medical_records m JOIN patients p ON m.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON m.doctor_id = d.doctor_id JOIN appointments a ON m.appointment_id = a.appointment_id WHERE m.diagnosis = 'Hypertension'
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, address, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, address, doctor_name FROM Patients p JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id JOIN Doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE age < 30;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM Patients p JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id JOIN Doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id WHERE appointment_date > CURDATE();
